issue.title: [C++][Docs] Typo in RecordBatch::schema
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13458](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13458). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The API docs for RecordBatch state:

_inline const std::shared_ptr<[Schema](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/cpp/api/datatype.html#_CPPv4N5arrow6SchemaE)> &schema() const[¶](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/cpp/api/table.html#_CPPv4NK5arrow11RecordBatch6schemaEv)_
 _Returns_

_true if batches are equal_

This looks like out of place.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13458?focusedCommentId=17388111) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10811
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10811>
